paragraphs: Data analyst graduate with a background in business operations and quality assurance, skilled in Excel, Power BI and SQL. Experienced in customer support, generating insights and cross-functional collaboration. Seeking a new opportunity to leverage my analytical, problem-solving and communication skills in a data-driven role.

responsibilities.title: General Administrative Support
responsibilities.description: Providing general administrative support for an IT consulting company

responsibilities.title: Process Improvement
responsibilities.description: Creating and documenting work processes to increase efficiency

responsibilities.title: Power BI Development
responsibilities.description: Developed a Power BI report for the Corporate Functions department

responsibilities.title: Game Quality Assurance
responsibilities.description: Ensured the functional quality of a computer game as part of an agile, cross-functional team

responsibilities.title: Issue Management
responsibilities.description: Worked with JIRA to identify, document and prioritize software issues

responsibilities.title: Data Analysis
responsibilities.description: Used SQL in Snowflake to query telemetry data, supporting the Analytics team in tracking game performance and user behavior

responsibilities.title: Team Leadership
responsibilities.description: Led and supported outsourced QA team members

responsibilities.title: Project Management Support
responsibilities.description: Assisted Producers with backlog management and facilitating meetings

responsibilities.title: Documentation and Best Practices
responsibilities.description: Worked with Confluence to establish and document agile testing best-practices in a growing QA department

responsibilities.title: Operations Coordination
responsibilities.description: Coordinated the day-to-day operations of a small telecoms company

responsibilities.title: Multi-departmental Management
responsibilities.description: Handled various tasks, such as accounting, HR and customer service

responsibilities.title: Business Development
responsibilities.description: Focused on customer retention, supplier relationships and hiring new talent to scale up the business

roles.title: FIT Assistant Manager and Customer Delivery Manager

responsibilities.title: Department Operations
responsibilities.description: Coordinated the operations of the Offline FIT Department

responsibilities.title: Client Portfolio Management
responsibilities.description: Ensured the retention of a portfolio of clients and delivery on financial targets, recruited and mentored new staff, monitored team and individual performance

responsibilities.title: Travel Operations
responsibilities.description: Processed bookings and requests from global travel partners, created travel itineraries, contracted and reserved accommodation and other travel services
